subject: Baseball
Citi Field (NYC)
Ponzi Schemes
lead_paragraph: The Mets said that the team remains financially sound despite the exposure of the principal owner, Fred Wilpon, to Bernard L. Madoff’s suspected Ponzi scheme.
snippet: The Mets said that the team remains financially sound despite the exposure of the principal owner, Fred Wilpon, to Bernard L. Madoff’s suspected Ponzi scheme.
